column5: The 2013 auction to help fight cancer is now over I want to say thank you to all who have donated and bid on these great items.  This year you all raised $1432 that is going to the fish-a-thon for a cure.  Most items are already paid for so that is awesome. I can't wait for the event to get out and see you all again.  Cheers
That is awesome Mike but I think the thanks should go the other way, to you guys for going out of your way to organize this auction!!
Great news Mike!!  A big thank you to Danna and yourself for taking this on and making it the success that it is.
As a fairly new and somewhat terminal cancer patient..... I am not sure what to say? So I will keep it brief...  Thank you to all who donated their time and items to this worthy cause....!  the cap't
Well done I ended up with nice Spiel custom and an autographed shimano lid ,pretty excited about that
Thank to both of you Mike!!  Looking forward to seeing you at the event!

Frank has already stepped up but on behalf of all of the Fish-a-Thon for a Cure gang I want to send out a HUGE thank you to Mike and Danna for doing everything that they do for our event!  You guys have become a big part of the Fish-a-Thon and we can't thank you enough!  A big thanks to those who donated prizes to Mike & Danna's auction and to those who bid on them!  We're looking foward to another awesome year and will be bombarding the board with information very soon!  THANKS!!!!!
